
h1. Broken links detection engine


eXo WCM supports services for broken links detection engine, which can manage how many error links and how many live links. This feature is displayed by properties of content in sites explorer

!F23.png!

With node property *exo:links* on picture above, it will run follow cycle time to check all links in content so that can manage what were broken links and what were live links on content. And then will display report for administrator. We can see console report as :

!ConsoleReport.png!
